text: Christopher Charles Miller (born October 15, 1965) is an American politician. He is the Acting United States Secretary of Defense since November 9, 2020. Miller became the director of the National Counterterrorism Center on August 6, 2020. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Christopher C. Miller
